Line11.101BAB: Maybe you should stay, meet the boss. It'd be good to have you around.
Line5.1000C2: All right. But don't think you're in the clear. I see you, Tomaj.
Line7.101BAB: Lovely to see you, as always (hic) Szil.
Line9.101BAB: Phew. Thanks. You bought me at least one more day in this place.
VoiceDir1.1000C2: With attitude; suspicious she's being lied to.
VoiceDir11.101BAB: Amicable. Though not an overly friendly person by nature, he's warmed to the player (to whom he's talking).
VoiceDir5.1000C2: Suspicious, almost angry. She feels she's been tricked or thwarted.
